meanings.sent1: At the end of the movie, the hero saved the day.
meanings.sent2: The book had a surprise twist at the end.
meanings.sent3: The race to the end of the block was won by the fastest runner.
meanings.sent4: The end of the rainbow seemed to disappear as they got closer.
meanings.sent5: The end of the tunnel was finally in sight after a long journey.

meanings.sent1: Her end was to become a doctor and help people.
meanings.sent2: The team worked together to achieve their common end.
meanings.sent3: His end of winning the game was met with cheers from the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The end of the puzzle revealed a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The end of the project was celebrated with a party.

meanings.definition: To bring something to a conclusion.
meanings.sent1: She wanted to end the argument peacefully.
meanings.sent2: The negotiations ended with a compromise.
meanings.sent3: He tried to end the meeting early, but everyone wanted to stay longer.
meanings.sent4: The magician ended his show with a spectacular trick.
meanings.sent5: The teacher ended the class with a fun game.

meanings.sent1: Please end the game so we can have dinner.
meanings.sent2: The concert ended with a standing ovation.
meanings.sent3: He decided to end his unhealthy habits for a better life.
meanings.sent4: The day ended with a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The movie ended on a cliffhanger, leaving the audience eager for the sequel.
